title: Lunar Flare
summaries: The Lunar Flare is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord magic weapon that has a 11.11*1/9 (11.11%) chance to be dropped by the Moon Lord. It summons three projectiles that rain down from above the game screen for each firing. These projectiles appear as turquoise streaks, and create small explosions on impact.

Unlike most weapons that summon projectiles from above (e.g. <linked>Starfury</linked>, <linked>Meteor Staff</linked>), Lunar Flare projectiles pass through any <linked>blocks</linked> necessary to arrive at the target point, making it a viable weapon even in enclosed areas.
